listData.name: OFFSET SAVINGS
listData.description: OFFSET SAVINGS

features.additionalValue: Apple Pay, Samsung Pay and Google Pay

features.additionalInfo: Internet Banking and Mobile Banking App.

Create a PayID through Horizon Bank s Internet Banking or Mobile Banking App to receive Osko payments with a unique identifier, such as your mobile number or email address, enabling you to receive and send money securely without the need to remember complex banking details.

This account type is enabled for Osko payments, via the New Payments Platform (NPP). Osko is the faster way to pay or receive money from friends, family and businesses. No more waiting days for money to change hands. Now you can pay and be paid in a matter of seconds
BPAY is an electronic bill payment service, providing a convenient access point for the payment and receipt of consumer bills.
Manage payments from your bank account using PayTo.

fees.name: BULK_COIN_COUNTAGE
fees.additionalInfo: Up to 2% for bulk coin counting above $300. Fee excludes money boxes & community

fees.name: OVERDRAWN_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT
fees.additionalInfo: per occurence

fees.name: TOTAL_CASH_WITHDRAWAL_ABOVE_4000_PER_DAY
fees.additionalInfo: A fee of 0.25% of total cash withdrawals is charged for total cash withdrawals over $4000 in a day.

fees.name: VISA_CARD_REPLACEMENT
fees.additionalInfo: Australia only

his account type is enabled for Osko payments, via the New Payments Platform (NPP). Osko is the faster way to pay or receive money from friends, family and businesses. No more waiting days for money to change hands. Now you can pay and be paid in a matter of seconds
